name: 研究方法與論文寫作
description: Familiarity with academic writing and research methods can be as important to one’s success as expertise in the discipline itself. A graduate student like you will want to be able to perform a variety of research methods and writing tasks such as research papers and theses. This course provides you with an opportunity to practice the research methods and writing conventions of academics in the disciplines of Translation & Interpretation Studies.  	After taking this course, you will be expected: (1)	to gather information about academic writing conventions in your research area, (2)	to analyze the structure and discourse conventions of numerous written products,  (3)	to practice writing for academic genres, (4)	to become familiar with the types of research methods typically used in the study of Translation and Interpretation.
goals: to gather information about academic writing conventions in your research area,
to analyze the structure and discourse conventions of numerous written products,
to practice writing for academic genres
to become familiar with the types of research methods typically used in the study of Translation and Interpretation.
